title: Scientific Miracles in the Noble Quran
description:
You could find in this torrent some miracles founds in the Noble Quran:

Stages of fetus creation.

Formation of fetus.

The sex of the baby.

Iron sent down from space.

Iron&#039;s Miracle.

Journey to the centre of the earth.

Bringing forth water after earth expansion.

The barriers between the seas.

Cyclical systems of sky.

Orbits.

The expanding universe.

The layers of the atmosphere.

The protected roof of the earth.

Fertilizing winds causing rain.

The function of mountains.

The movements of mountains.

Finger prints.
